description: This file defines the INotesService interface, which outlines the business logic layer for managing notes within the application. It specifies methods for retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting notes, and serves as a contract for implementing note-related operations.

classes.name: INotesService
classes.description: Interface for note-related operations, including retrieval, creation, updating, and deletion of notes.

methods.name: Get
methods.description: Retrieves a single note by its unique identifier.

methods.name: Create
methods.description: Creates a new note based on the provided DTO.

methods.name: Update
methods.description: Updates an existing note identified by its ID with new data from DTO.

methods.name: Delete
methods.description: Deletes a note identified by its ID.
